trans-unit.source: Username for Service BW API: The username to get a token for further API requests. Normally starts with ws_.
Password for Service BW API: Password to receive a token, which will be used for further API requests.
Mandant: Place the number of the mandant of the city (only BW).
URI of Service BW API: To which URI the API requests should be send?. Normally: https://sgw.service-bw.de:443/

Allowed languages: Define multiple allowed languages. Format: [2 letters language ISO code]=0. Assign multiple languages with ";". Example: de=0;en=0. First value will be used as default language. The zero is present for compatibility reasons.

Region IDs of city: Cities are mostly separated into sections. Type in each Region ID of these sections. If you don't know these Region IDs, keep this field empty. We will try to find them by AGS or PLZ.
AGS (Official Municipality Key): This value is only needed, if you don't know the Region IDs.
ZIP of your city: If you don't know the Region IDs nor the AGS we will try to fetch all Region IDs by one of your main ZIP.
